name: arc-decision-mcp-server
description: Intelligent assistant that helps decide whether to build tools as Skills, MCP Servers, Subagents, or Hybrids. Includes decision tree logic, learning from past decisions, and interactive guidance.
author: SSD Medical Practice
features: Architecture decision assistance (Skills vs MCP vs Subagent vs Hybrid)
Learning engine - records and analyzes past decisions
Template generation for all architecture types
Decision outcome tracking for continuous improvement
MCP resources for decision trees and learned patterns
tools: analyze_requirements - Analyze tool description and get recommendation
suggest_architecture - Get suggestion based on decision tree questions
compare_approaches - Compare MCP, Subagent, Skills, and Hybrid approaches
record_decision - Record decision for future learning
update_decision_outcome - Update how past decision turned out
get_statistics - Get statistics about learned decisions
resources: architecture://learned-patterns - All learned patterns from past decisions

syncConvention.instructions: To update local instance after template changes, run: cd [template-path] && ./install.sh
syncConvention.note: No automatic sync - AI will prompt user when template edits are detected
